long: Meaning: a "stroke", literally or figuratively (in various applications, as follow).  Usage: anvil, corner, foot(-step), going, (hundred-) fold, × now, (this)   once, order, rank, step,   thrice, (often-), second, this, two) time(-s), twice, wheel.  Source: or (feminine) "פַּעֲמָה"; from "H6470";
